title: Hua Jianghu: Bu Liang Ren Qi - Jiu Youxuan Tian

synonyms: Hua Jianghu: Bu Liang Ren 7th Season
alternative_titles.ja: 画江湖之不良人柒：九幽玄天

synopsis:
Mobei is calm on the surface, but in fact, it is surging secretly. Queen Shuliduo is planning a conference. The Bad Leader shows up in Mobei with a group of bad people to investigate the situation in Mobei. The four corpse ancestors headed by Jiangchen also come to Mobei to open an antique soup shop during this period. The mysterious murderer makes people panic, and the various forces have their own thoughts...

(Source: Tencent, translated)
